State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: AK47OG
State.Description: Blade runner 2077 Better Finer Rain v2.0.  Changes the games rain to look more realistic. Patch 1.31 compatible.
State.Name: Blade runner 2077 Better Finer Rain v2.0 Final

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Hides main HUD widgets by default and shows them only on certain events (configurable). Adds in-game widget toggle hotkeys and a bunch of optional files to tweak different HUD elements.
State.Name: Limited HUD

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: River now Eats, Drinks, Sleeps and Worksout around Joss' family trailer; if you have romanced him he also Showers, and V can hug him at any of his activity spots. Joss' kids are also fixed so they actually sleep now! They also play in their bedroom and in the main hallway area. Also fixes broken audio in River's holocalls
State.Name: River Romanced Enhanced (and general fixes)

State.Author: Paradox4624
State.Description: When melee attacking from stealth, this mod suppresses auto uncrouching, for the initial stealth attack and additional melee attacks for 3 seconds after entering combat. If the first attack kills outright, the player should remain in stealth. Otherwise, with some quick follow-up attacks, the player may be able to end combat and re-enter stealth.
State.Name: No uncrouching when melee attacking from stealth

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Adds a new type of Operating System to the game which allows for the crafting and control of companion Drones, Androids, and Mechs.
State.Name: Drone Companions

State.Author: flib
State.Description:
A collection of quality-of-life UI improvements.

 Sorting your quests, messages and shards. 

 Vehicle preview images on ride quests.

 Never lose your iconics.
State.Name: flib's UI Improvements

State.Author: Jack Humbert
State.Description: Adds a redscript-configurable "Mod Settings" page to the main menu that any mod can add a page to.
State.Name: Mod Settings

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to add custom text notes for your manually created saved games.
State.Name: Named Saves

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik and e256
State.Description: Basic car pack for Virtual Car Dealer
State.Name: Vehicle Pack - Basic

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Very basic framework which allows modders to add any vehicle to a simple virtual shop using TweakXL.
State.Name: Virtual Car Dealer

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Extends default crafting capabilities allowing you to choose clothes and weapons skins, plus weapons damage type and name while crafting.
State.Name: Enhanced Craft

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to use vanilla timeskip widget in a more immersive way.
State.Name: Immersive Timeskip

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to mark any item in your inventory as a Junk so you will be able to sell all marked items at once using vendors "Sell Junk" option.
State.Name: Mark To Sell

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Enables the player to use weapons while driving and overhauls the police system to create frequent vehicle chases and combat.
State.Name: Vehicle Combat

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Increases the amount of available wardrobe slots from 6 to 14 and adds an option to hide items from available clothes list.
State.Name: Wardrobe Extras

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Improves enemy netrunners by adding a bunch of hacks (most are restored cut content) they can use on the player, and fixing some CDPR bugs that stop netrunners from hacking you most of the time.
State.Name: AI Netrunners Enhanced

State.Author: SketchCritic
State.Description: The blood splatter/decal system in Cyberpunk is severely underutilized. This mod unleashes its potential, with three presets to choose from, and an optional file to increase blood splatter size.
State.Name: More Blood Splatters

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Fixes some bugs with optical camo to make all three versions (rare, epic legendary) actually hide you from enemies (normally Rare and Epic don't work if you have the Ghost perk).
State.Name: Optical Camo Bug Fixes

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: Install Cyberdeck and Operating System (Sandevistan / Berserk) at the same time
State.Name: System-EX

State.Author: Erok
State.Description:
Modify Your Favorite Player Vehicles! 

All in a physical location! 

With Native UI!!!
State.Name: Car Modification Shop

State.Author: Erok
State.Description:
C.V.O 



Overhauls Every Single Vehicle's top speed, power, handling and brakes
State.Name: Cyber Vehicle Overhaul

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Small mod that adds Controls for Headlights On/Off, Headlights Brightness and Vehicle Windows Opened/Closed.
State.Name: Extra Vehicle Controls

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod adds a purchase, upgrade and useable Nano Drone to the game, that can be used for scouting out areas but also offensively.
State.Name: Nano Drone

State.Author: The Cyberpunk THING Team
State.Description: Overhauls Time Dilation in Cyberpunk to provide a more challenging and rewarding experience. Featuring all new abilities such as Katana Reflect, Vehicle Time Dilation, and Teleportation!
State.Name: Time Dilation Overhaul

Original.Name: Playable Arcade Machines 1.0 (Only Native Roach Race)-4213-1-1n-1662555077.zip

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod lets you play different mini-games on the physical arcade machines
State.Name: Playable Arcade Machines

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Makes the Target Analysis eye mod apply only to Smart weapons.
State.Name: Smarter Target Analysis

State.Author: sjbox
State.Description: Removes auto disabling of the walk toggle
State.Name: No Walk Auto Disable

State.Author: yamashi
State.Description: Scripting framework for modders and quality of life fixes.
State.Name: Cyber Engine Tweaks

State.Author: DemiGoD715
State.Description: Allows the player to control the character's movement direction midair while jumping and double jumping. Keyboard + mouse only for now. UPDATE v0.3: made landing, climbing, sprinting smoother and implemented tap strafing (kind of :P)
State.Name: Alternative Midair Movement

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Adds configurable zoom levels to scoped weapons, that can be cycled through.
State.Name: Zoomable Scopes

State.Author: OREZXX
State.Description: Removes the  useless Crouch vignette effect
State.Name: Crouch vignette effect remover

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: This mod's goal is to make Lynx Paws a viable alternative to the other leg cyberware by offering things you want that are not double/hover jump.
State.Name: Lynx Paws Reimagined

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Repeats firstEquip animation each time you equip your weapon or press a hotkey. Allows to trigger additional weapon inspection animations: IdleBreak and SafeAction. Highly configurable.
State.Name: Always First Equip

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Makes any/all of two-handed clubs, hammers, and quick-melee attacks non-lethal. Configurable.
State.Name: Non-lethal Blunt Weapons

State.Author: apart
State.Description: Turns the Sasquatch's Hammer into an Iconic weapon with a unique modifier and allows you to upgrade it  to Epic and Legendary quality.
State.Name: Iconic Sasquatch's Hammer

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: This is a CET mod to get rid of the irritating sticky UI elements issues: the Center Dot, the Crosshair, the Subtitles, the Progress Bar and the Shard hum
State.Name: Dot No More and - no Sticky Crosshair - no sticky Subtitles - no sticky Progress Bar - no Shard sticky hum

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Scales up conversation skill checks so that you'll see options requiring higher attribute levels in general and as you level up. For those who want their attribute choices to both limit and reward.
State.Name: Convo Skill Check Scaling

State.Author: SOSUINEPXISUYU
State.Description: Brief overview(doesn't exist)
State.Name: More Fluid Parkour

State.Author: suckerold
State.Description: Restores Panam's Overwatch sniper rifle wall penetration ability.
State.Name: Overwatch wall penetration fix (CET) 1.6

State.Author: Spicy2332
State.Description: Makes changes to the quick hack screen - either cleans it up completely or just cleans up the default green
State.Name: Spicy Clean Hack Screen

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Increases stamina costs for all actions so that you have to think about stamina, which makes stamina-related perks useful. Also awards Athletics XP based on stamina use (much more than base game), giving more XP for longer "workouts".
State.Name: Sensible Stamina and Athletics

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod lets you tweak the range, brightness and durability of vehicle headlights
State.Name: Extended and Improved Headlights

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Makes armor reduce damage from ALL weapon types (instead of only ranged) and fixes some ranged weapons where armor was working too much (shotgun) or not at all (Oda's gun).
State.Name: Armor Fix for All Weapons

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Displays the actual names for vendors world map icons instead of generic type labels.
State.Name: Real Vendor Names

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Disables camera auto centering while driving in TPP or FPP mode.
State.Name: No Camera Auto Centering

State.Author: The Cyberpunk THING Team
State.Description: Fixes ranged damage decreasing when attacks per second increases.
State.Name: Ranged Attack Speed Damage Fix

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Using healing items builds up your "Toxicity" until you "Overdose", requiring you to wait for the effect to wear off before using more inhalers/injectors.
State.Name: Toxicity

State.Author: TeslaCoiled
State.Description: This mod provides options to balance/tweak leg cyberware. Native UI compatible.
State.Name: Leg Cyberware Tweaks

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Adds a simple toggleable flashlight to the game.
State.Name: Simple Flashlight

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Make the Breach minigame more challenging by having the timer start immediately and shortening the timer length. Completely configurable in-game! (Previously released as part of Level Scaling & Balance)
State.Name: Challenging Breach Minigame

State.Author: WopsS
State.Description: A script extender for REDengine 4.
State.Name: RED4ext

State.Author: DeepBlueFrog
State.Description: Sets items sliders to max by default for Drop, Stash and Sell actions.
State.Name: Adaptive Sliders

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Adds custom quickslots/hotkeys to the bottom of the screen for consumables, grenades, and cyberware abilities. Fully configurable with in-game menu. Supports controllers and keyboard/mouse.
State.Name: Custom Quickslots for Consumables Grenades and Cyberware Abilities

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Dynamic zoom for vehicle minimap, configurable zoom for on foot minimap, minimap peek hotkey
State.Name: Improved Minimap Zoom

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Disables camera auto centering while driving in TPP or FPP mode.
State.Name: No Camera Auto Centering

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Disables the incredibly annoying Vignette effect that is always on and makes the game significantly darker, especially near the edges of the screen. Additional files to disable the unnecessary always on Sharpening filter or both!
State.Name: Disable Vignette and Sharpening

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to tweak some interaction and loot markers visibility behavior.
State.Name: Muted Markers

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: A small mod that shows you what attribute level you needed for conversation skill checks that you pass (normally the game just shows your current attribute level).
State.Name: Clear Skill Checks

State.Author: jac3km4
State.Description: Compiler for Cyberpunk2077 scripts
State.Name: redscript

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Adds various options for increasing the difficulty of the game.
State.Name: SDO - Scissors Difficulty Options

State.Author: Wind Spirit
State.Description:
Disables vertical snap up when wanting to positing the camera down,

in first person driving view. Good for Motorcycles.
State.Name: Vertical Camera Snap Fix

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Stops combat from auto-triggering when you use a silenced gun or throwing knife. Lets you use those weapons from stealth even when you don't one-shot kill enemies.
State.Name: Silent Silencers and Throwing Knives

State.Author: Erok
State.Description: My INI file that I use with all the mods I created thus far
State.Name: Erok's Driving Tweaks

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Collection of simple bug fixes for Cyberpunk's gameplay.
State.Name: Simple Gameplay Bug Fixes

State.Author: The Cyberpunk THING Team
State.Description: This mod provides balancing and configuration options for Cyberdecks.
State.Name: Cyberdeck Tweaks

Original.Name: Night City Interactions v0.2.3 All languages-5519-0-2-3-1665186520.zip

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a number of bar drinking spots to the game where V can grab a drink, maybe even share one... v0.2.x is limited to Watson locations. Also adds some vista/locations from Edgerunners where V can sit/relax. Future updates will add more districts, more actions (eating), and *maybe* more characters.
State.Name: Night City Interactions - Watson Drinks and Edgerunners locales

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Prevents auto disassembling for valuable junk items by setting the upper price threshold for Scrapper perk logic
State.Name: Smarter Scrapper

State.Author: apart
State.Description: Restores some Crafting Specs.
State.Name: Restored Crafting Specs

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Disables the game intro videos.
State.Name: No Intro Videos

State.Author: maniman303
State.Description: Gives engineer experience for every shot made with smart gun or fully loaded tech gun without piercing through walls and doubles it if the shot pierces a surface.
State.Name: Engineer Weapon Exp (from Tech and Smart guns)

State.Author: Kratoes
State.Description: removes almost everything from the hacking screen making it extra clean :smirk:
State.Name: Extra Clean Hacking Screen

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Panam now Eats, Drinks, Showers, Sleeps and uses her phone around the Aldecaldos' camp, if you have romanced her. V can chat with and hug her at any of her activity spots, and her bed also now works more reliably.
State.Name: Panam Romanced Enhanced

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Just adds category filters for your storage items list.
State.Name: Stash Filters

State.Author: WillyJL
State.Description: Fix annoying "features" of this bloody game. Currently available: disable relic malfunctions, disable mantis blades finishers, skip call dialogue, no landing movement lock, remove fall damage, jump fixes, disable walk / dont walk crosswalks sfx, stand up for dialogue, reasonable police spawn dista
State.Name: Annoy Me No More

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Allows many more enemies in Night City to quickhack the player.
State.Name: Amateur Hackers

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Fixes 8 distinct bugs with the status/buff/debuff bar and weapon wheel.
State.Name: Status Bar Bug Fixes

State.Author: WillyJL
State.Description: Fix annoying "features" of this bloody game. Currently available: disable relic malfunctions, disable mantis blades finishers, skip call dialogue, no landing movement lock, remove fall damage, jump fixes, disable walk / dont walk crosswalks sfx, stand up for dialogue, reasonable police spawn dista
State.Name: Annoy Me No More

State.Author: TeslaCoiled
State.Description: The purpose of this mod is to fix the armor, melee damage, and resistance values for the Berserk Cyberware.
State.Name: Berserk Fix

State.Author: zouzoulle
State.Description: Enables side sliding. Much more flexibility on the slide's trajectory. Improves camera control when sliding. Prevents stairs and small obstacles like sidewalks from canceling the slide.
State.Name: Improved Slide

State.Author: DesireCampbell
State.Description: Corrects the icons for Power and Tech weapons.
State.Name: Power Tech Icon Fix

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: Archive extension loader
State.Name: ArchiveXL

State.Author: jac3km4
State.Description: Command-line argument loader for Cyberpunk 2077
State.Name: cybercmd

State.Author: finley243
State.Description: Makes netrunner gameplay more difficult by preventing quickhacks until the network is breached.
State.Name: Better Netrunning - Hacking Reworked

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Lets you zoom onto your character in the inventory screen
State.Name: Inventory Zoom

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod allows other mods to easily add settings menus using only native UI, thus looking like the games settings menu
State.Name: Native Settings UI

Original.Name: Disable ONLY 2D Effect For UI And Disable Chrom Ab-2648-1-2-1645930894.rar

State.Author: Dravic
State.Description: This mod disables the 2D repeated UI effect (that looks like you're seeing double/triple/quadruple) and disables the spheric 3D effect (stretching UI to a perspective). Cyberpunk 2077 UI suffers from not enough customization options. The 3D and 2D effects that the UI uses are considered to be very distracting, even if they seem immersive at first.
State.Name: Purify The UI - disable annoying 2D ghosting and 3D perspective shader effects - No More Lens Distortion or Ghosting Double Vision Interface

Original.Name: Filter Saves by Lifepath and Type-3400-1-1-1-1658443447.zip

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Adds buttons in Save and Load menus to filter saves by Lifepath and type (manual/auto/quick/point of no return, etc.). Works with controller too!
State.Name: Filter Saves by Lifepath and Type

State.Author: Raumfliege
State.Description: Disables auo switching for thrown knifes.
State.Name: Disable Auto Switching for Throwing Knives

State.Author: kratoes
State.Description: removes the healthbar above enemy heads (also removes a lot of other stuff)
State.Name: (enemy healthbars) begone

State.Author: SketchCritic
State.Description: Improves flexibility of limbs, resulting in a greater variety of final poses and more natural animation. Also fixes vanilla collision issues that caused some NPC models to bend one leg backward in an unnatural angle. Compatible with update 1.5 of Cyberpunk.
State.Name: Ragdoll Physics Overhaul

State.Author: Walrus420
State.Description: Improves the LOD textures of ALL billboards in the game!
State.Name: Vanilla Billboard LODs Improved

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Just removes world placed shards which you have already read.
State.Name: Hide Read Shards

State.Author: PotatoOfDoom
State.Description: This mod allows you to unequip cyberware.
State.Name: Unequip Cyberware

State.Author: Scissors123454321
State.Description: Disables the red highlight effect on enemies from showing up through walls.
State.Name: Disable Highlighting Through Walls

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: TweakDB modifications loader and script extensions
State.Name: TweakXL

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Configurable multipliers for all XP types, including level, street cred, crafting, stealth, all weapon XP types, engineering, etc.
State.Name: Simple XP Multiplier

State.Author: Kratoes
State.Description: removes the "entering new area" notification every time you enter a location new or not
State.Name: (entering new area) be gone

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: 1) Allows re-crafting Iconics at the current quality level (only with existing recipes), so you aren't incentivized to wait before upgrading. 2) Allows crafting mods at lower quality levels so you can equip them on lower quality weapons and clothing. 3) Fixes small bug with crafting discounts not applying to some ingredients of weapon/armor mods.
State.Name: Crafting Quality of Life

State.Author: pMarK
State.Description: Adds a disassemble option when looting.
State.Name: Disassemble As Looting Choice

State.Author: Jack Humbert
State.Description: This plugin looks for all r6/input/*.xml files and merges them with the appropriate input config file from r6/config/ and saves results to r6/cache/. A configuration file is written to engine/config/platform/pc/input_loader.ini, which tells the game to load the merged .xml files.
State.Name: Input Loader

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Overhauls Sticky Grenades, converting them into throwable proximity mines, as well as adding several new grenades.
State.Name: Sticky Mines

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Allows you to configure various stats about each weapon, including damage, fire rate, recoil, etc.
State.Name: SWSC - Simple Weapon Stat Customization

State.Author: Kratoes
State.Description: removes the (safe area) notification everytime you enter a safe area
State.Name: (safe area) be gone

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a few different states for Judy to be in when you visit her apartment once romanced; no longer stuck to her window. Includes the hug mod!
State.Name: Judy Romanced Enhanced

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: A few minor tweaks to vehicle summon system: increased repair cost, decreased summon distances, paid vehicle calls and dismissing.
State.Name: Vehicle Summon Tweaks

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: Untrack quest/undo untrack quest. A complete solution.
State.Name: A complete Quest Untrack with undo - instant untrack and track back if needed

State.Author: RMK
State.Description:
Separate files to 

1) add NPC level scaling (multiple options), 

2) give NPCs damage reduction (like armor) - configurable in game
State.Name: Level Scaling and Balance

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: Stop the car and apartment deals spam!
State.Name: Stop spammers

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description:
Adds a few different states for Kerry to be in when you visit him. Adds options to listen to him play guitar. Adds the option to hug him, if you are in a relationship.

Updated for patch 1.6 and REDmod version available
State.Name: Kerry Interactions Enhanced

State.Author: DeS3InY
State.Description: Changes the upgrade cost of items so upgrading items costs are scaled by item level instead of the number of times upgraded
State.Name: Item Level Scaled Upgrade Cost

State.Author: pMarK
State.Description: Adds a disassemble option when looting.
State.Name: Disassemble As Looting Choice

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Removes the slowdown when deflecting attacks.
State.Name: No Deflect Slomo

Original.Name: Level Scaling with No Minimum Levels-1712-2-1-1-1630928803.zip

State.Author: RMK
State.Description:
Separate files to 

1) add NPC level scaling (multiple options), 

2) give NPCs damage reduction (like armor) - configurable in game
State.Name: Level Scaling and Balance

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Changes weather patterns and min/max durations so that rain and other interesting weather happens more often.
State.Name: Weather Probability Rebalance

State.Author: apart
State.Description: Adds iconic rarity to more unique items and allows some quest specific clothing to be upgraded like the 1.5 DLC items.
State.Name: DLC and Iconic Modifiers

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: A simple mod that disables the crosshair for all weapons except for smartweapons. Optionally lets you toggle the crosshair for the Monowire, Gorilla Arms and Projectile Launcher.
State.Name: Only Smartweapon Crosshairs

State.Author: Busy Oscar
State.Description: A simple mod that removes the small red dots on the rear sights to provide better clarity and focus.
State.Name: Better Kyubi Sights

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Increases time spans between sickness effects applied to V by The Relic, also has an option to block the effect.
State.Name: Relic Effect Periods

Original.Name: Vehicle Summon Tweaks - Shorter Summon Distance-4658-1-0-0-1655396728.zip

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: A few minor tweaks to vehicle summon system: increased repair cost, decreased summon distances, paid vehicle calls and dismissing.
State.Name: Vehicle Summon Tweaks

State.Author: Scissors
State.Description: Enables the player to craft during combat.
State.Name: Combat Crafting
